resources.string: Camera disabled due to security restrictions

This website contains malware. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
Attackers on this website might try to steal your identity and private information, causing privacy compromise, financial loss and other harms. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website contains a game bot. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website contains deceptive information about making money online. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.

This website has been involved in prize scams or money transfer fraud. Attackers might trick you to provide verification codes and pay \"remittance charges\". Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website is a suspicious blog. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website contains malicious information, politically incorrect opinions, and other improper content. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website might redirect to a suspicious site. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website is on a private game server. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website contains pornographic content. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website has been involved in malicious or deceptive value-added telecom service. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website has been involved in phishing and account hacking. Attackers might steal your QQ, WeChat and other accounts. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website has been involved in prize scams. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website contains links to another dangerous site. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
This website might contain potentially risky content. Security suggests that you do NOT visit this site.
Using slider control. Currently set to %1$s
Turn on Camera > Settings > AI scene recognition. Aicy auto recognizes portraits, night scenes, blue sky, food and more before each press of the shutter, and selects the best photo for you
Turn on Camera > Beauty, Aicy will beautify your face according to your gender, age, skin type and skin tone. No need to learn any parameters, you can have a clear and natural selfie

Enable Camera > More > Document adjustment, align the finder frame with the document, slides, documents, etc., and tap the shutter. Aicy will recognize the document area and auto correct it to generate a scanned copy
Swipe up while viewing the image to see the related people, things, places, etc. that Aicy associates with. Recall each moments of the picture and wake up you memory then
"Turn on Camera > More > Super Night to experience a fascinating night. Display details in dark light by multi-frame merging. It's so easy to have a good shot in the night"
"Enable Gallery > Album Page, Aicy sorts each of your photos, whether it's your friend, pet, or meal."
Tap model to interact with it
Tap and drag with one finger to move model
Slide horizontally with two fingers to rotate model
Move two fingers apart/toward to zoom model
Aim at a QR code or barcode to scan
Unable to launch the requested app
Can be added as calendar event
Your phone is overheating. The processing will slow down in current mode to protect your phone.
Get exact location to record the place
Camera needs to access the internet, use your location and use the microphone to record the location and record the video
Get fun stickers and AR Fun shots
Input should be less than 20 characters
Burst shooting is not supported in Filter mode
